mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fest_main where fest_m_area LIKE '%서울%'
SELECT * FROM fest_main where fest_m_area LIKE '%경기%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival_test (fest_title, fest_location, fest_category, fest_startday, fest_endday, fest_detail, fest_price, fest_desc) VALUES (#{festTitle}, #{festLocation}, #{festCategory}, #{festStartday}, #{festEndday}, #{festDetail}, #{festPrice}, #{festDesc})
